breadcrumbs.title: Amend or refund a driving charge

texts: It can take up to 10 working days to process your refund request. We will contact you when this has been done.
Set up Auto Pay to be billed automatically for the Congestion Charge and, if your vehicle does not meet the emissions standards, the ULEZ charge when you drive within central London.
Refund or amend another charge with the same receipt number, or find charges on a different receipt.
